doc.after: In mathematics computing linguistics and related disciplines an algorithm is a type of effective method in which a definite list of well defined instructions for completing a task when given an initial state will proceed through a well defined series of successive states eventually terminating in an end state The transition from one state to the next is not necessarily deterministic some algorithms known as probabilistic algorithms incorporate randomness
